name: When you want me to respond to you...
body:
## in 30 minutes or so
Please call me on my mobile number

## in around 2 hours
Send a text message to my mobile number

## today or early tomorrow
Send me an IM to my Hipchat/IRC/Skype/Jabber/Yammer account

## in a day or two
Send me an email - and put [action] in the subject! I filter all the other stuff.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
